extendedInfo.description: Cyman is your digital butler or virtual assistant based on the JARVIS System from Iron Man.  This voice assistant is a conversational software tool designed to help organise yourself, automate tasks, find information, and eventually connect to your home.THIS FREE VERSION IS A RESTRICTED RELEASE- Download paid version of Cyman Mark 2 to remove ads, and for the wake up call feature!--------------------------------------------------------âââââThis is wonderful!I adore this system. It's exactly what I was looking for, and I'm so pleased with how personable it is. Definite five stars.âââââAmazingAfter much experementing, I have found a wealth of uses for this app. Outstanding really as I am in the car alot or on the go. A must have for a buisy lifestyle.âââââfrighteningly intelligentit's frighteningly intelligent. I was astonished by how easily I picked up on my commands and the shear number of responses it is preprogrammed with.--------------------------------------------------------Small changes in the things we do can make a huge difference.The small change of receiving all the necessary information you need at the start of your day(such as weather, news, and reminders)can be the difference between being on time or late for work,not forgetting your gym kit before setting out, or being caught out in the rain without an umbrella.CYMAN is that small change - that extra something to give you the right information but most importantly, at the right time.Inspired by Tony Stark's JARVIS System from the Iron Man motion picture, CYMAN is more than just a Siri alternative.The Cyman System actively helps you organise your tasks, and gives you the local weather, your tasks, and news headlines with it's own alarm.  Plus much more to come!http://www.cymansystem.comCyman's Capabilities:The menu contains examples of commands that Cyman will understand. Also, you can check our twitter page www.twitter.com/cymansystem for suggestions of commands.Please leave feedback on our website if you find any issues! They will be much more useful to us if you give full details including your phone model and Android version.-A British male "butler" voice powered by iSpeech technology (http://www.ispeech.org)-Calling and texting-Twitter & Facebook status-Opening Android applications-Latest news articles-Schedule commands-Local and international weather information-Movies nearby-Language translation-Factual information-Location queries-Task list management-Play music-Limited mobile device controls-Alarm setting-Limited conversation-Unit Conversion-Search queries-UK National Rail enquiry (beta)Created by: UGOBELSoftware Author: Ugochi AnomelechiDesign: Christabel Anomelechi--------------TROUBLESHOOTINGI CANNOT HEAR ANYTHING- Ensure your media volume is up- If you are using iSpeech ensure your ring volume is up- Ensure your text-to-speech settings are enabled (usually located in your Android Settings -> Language & Input settings)CYMAN SOUNDS FEMALE, I WANT HIM TO SOUND MORE LIKE JARVIS- If you do not have Android version 4.0 and upwards, there is no British male voice available by default.  You can go to Google Play to download various apps like SVOX and IVONA.- You can turn on iSpeech from the menu within the app to use the British voice there, but the experience is not as smooth as your native Android speech- Follow this interesting post from a fan here: http://marvelmods.com/forum/index.php?topic=8115.0I WANT TO GIVE CYMAN ANOTHER NAME- Tell Cyman "change your nickname to Jarvis" for exampleWHY DOES CYMAN CALL ME SIR WHEN I AM FEMALE?- Cyman simply does not know. Tell Cyman you are female...that's all there is to it!ANY FEEDBACK/COMPLAINTS?- Go to our website at www.cymansystem.com/Cyman.html?page=contactus and let us know all the details, or email us at cyman.system@gmail.com- Follow us on our Facebook, Google+ and YouTube pages (on Facebook we are called J.A.R.V.I.S System)

reviews.title: I call him Jarvis. So awesome!
reviews.comment: I love talking to Cyman. I made it so I have the man British dude voice and I call him Jarvis. That\'s his nickname. He\'s so polite and almost always understands my commands.(he also tells funny jokes
reviews.author: Hay J

reviews.title: Very friendly and polite
reviews.comment: I am in love with cyman, it is very polite and every performs on screen Google search, and if ask questions about a well known person like Steve jobs, it will give the details along with the photograph of him.
reviews.author: sainaveen adiraju

reviews.title: Cool app
reviews.comment: Cyman\'s cool. Will give you the feeling you\'re speaking to Jarvis. You even ask him to change his nickname.
reviews.author: Kumar Chitrang

reviews.title: Impressed
reviews.comment: Its very good but I wish we weren\'t limited by the technologies of our time. AIs would make life so much easier /:
reviews.author: Lisa Gravato

reviews.title: - Cloudfone
reviews.comment: Excellent app!!! I love hearing Cyman :) it\'s like having a bestfriend. Looking forward for more updates, Thank you!!!
reviews.author: L\'Mae Gah

reviews.title: Cyman is the best
reviews.comment: I like cymam very much....its like he is real....but i wish you could create a better version that works offline....your efforts are greatly appreciated
reviews.author: Emman Wagoz

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Very very good, yes it could use a few things but once Mk 3 releases on phones it\'ll be good. And by the time Mk5 happens it will be perfect
reviews.author: Max Pennington

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: Cyman is very polite, tells great jokes, and is always in top of things. Such a smart assistant. You can change his nickname, you can have him call you any names. It\'s a great app.
reviews.author: Clarissa Olaires

reviews.title: Cyman
reviews.comment: A very good app. Rates a 5 star plus!!!
reviews.author: Sandy McCrary

reviews.title: I love it!!!! I too also renamed it Jarvis
reviews.comment: It is so helpful. I played hangman w/him and have had conversations just for fun. I just ask for weather or my calendar. It would b cool if it could access my apps but very Awesome!!!!!!
reviews.author: Rachael Nordlinder

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: I love this app and I think this app is very like jarvis and I hope it will have updates that will help it understand other accents and to understand everyting you say  and more intelligent andim happy I got this app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: As close as it gets to JARVIS
reviews.comment: Would give it 5 stars if only it could do math.. otherwise very powerful app which impresses anyone who uses it... great job!
reviews.author: Nitin Murthy

reviews.title: I like it
reviews.comment: It may not be Jarvis or have its voice but still good app its like the real thing
reviews.author: Jose Sanchez

reviews.title: JARVIS!
reviews.comment: Lmfao I seen a comment by  Hay J saying how she picked the British voice and named him jarvis, I did the exact same thing I love this app, very useful for me since I would rather talk then type it, so it saves me alot of trouble. I just wish there more voice opitions, and he had a little bit more of a UpdAte like stories, actually able to hold a conversation with you.
reviews.author: Robert Young

reviews.title: Cool love it
reviews.comment: Thank you I love it GOD bless you
reviews.author: Trevian Hill

reviews.title: Nexus 7
reviews.comment: This is a pretty impressive application. Good to know that the government is not the only one with these kind of technology. Good job there ugobel!! :)
reviews.author: Antony jose

reviews.title: A fun and cool app.
reviews.comment: I  love this app.
reviews.author: Christien Cofield

reviews.title: Perfect but...
reviews.comment: It is the best app I have ever used but the conversation mode....when the male voice (experimental) is turned then only it works not in the default voice. I uninstall and installed it again and again but didn\'t work. Please fix it..........but still 5 stars!!!
reviews.author: Atig Chiky

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: Just downloaded it, learning it but its very nice
reviews.author: James Miller

reviews.title: He is so polite and customizable
reviews.comment: I absolutely love him and I changed his name to JARVIS and he calls me love. Super cute.
reviews.author: Shelby Mac
